text: Simple People () is a 1945 Soviet war movie directed by Grigori Kozintsev and Leonid Trauberg.Мрачные интерьеры замка Гамлета построили в павильоне «Ленфильма»Простые люди (1945) It stars Yuri Tolubeyev, Olga Lebzak, and Boris Zhukovsky. ==Actors== * Yuri Tolubeyev - Yeryemin * Olga Lebzak - Yeryemina * Boris Zhukovsky - Makeev * F. Babadzhanov - Akbashev * Yekaterina Korchagina- Aleksandrovskaya - grandmother * I. Kudryavtseva - Varvara == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1945 war movies Category:Soviet war movies Category:Movies directed by Grigori Kozintsev Category:Movies directed by Leonid Trauberg
title: Simple People
